title.narrative: Assainissement intégré et durable des ménages vulnérables et d'un groupe scolaire dans trois quartiers défavorisés (Koweit / commune de Yopougon, Sagbé et Kennedy-Clouetcha / commune d'Abobo) du district d'Abidjan

description.narrative: Réalisation d'infrastructures d'assainissement de base et promotion des bonnes pratiques dhygiène visant l'amélioreration des conditions sanitaires des populations vulnérables de 3 quartiers précaires dAbidjan.

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Cote d'Ivoire

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Cote d'Ivoire

description.narrative: District d'AbidjanCommunes de Yopougon (Quartier Koweit) et Abobo (Quartiers Sagbé et Kennedy-Clouetcha)

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
